com.project.uoft.thermostat_interface

Class Energy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.project.uoft.thermostat_interface.Energy

  • public class Energy
extends java.lang.Object
    The Energy class encapsulates energy usage related methods.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Energy

        Energy()
        Constructor for the Energy class. It retrieves the cooling power and heating power from the Firebase database for the current user.

    • Method Detail

      • timeToTemp

        public static double timeToTemp(double currTempC,
                                double tarTempC,
                                boolean cooling)
        It calculates how many minutes it takes to reach target temperature from current room temperature.
        Parameters:
        currTempC - Current room temperature.
        tarTempC - Target termperature.
        cooling - If the HVAC system is cooling.
        Returns:
        How many minutes it takes to reach target temperature from current room temperature.

      • tempToCents

        public static double tempToCents(double currTempC,
                                 double tarTempC,
                                 boolean cooling)
        It calculates how much cents it costs to reach target temperature.
        Parameters:
        currTempC - Current room temperature.
        tarTempC - Target termperature.
        cooling - Whether the HVAC system is cooling.
        Returns:
        How much cents it costs to reach target temperature.

      • centsToMaintain

        public static double centsToMaintain(boolean cooling)
        It calculate the cost per hour to maintain target temperature. It needs to be reworked because the calculation is very inaccurate.
        Parameters:
        cooling - Whether the HVAC system is cooling.
        Returns:
        Cost per hour to maintain target temperature.

      • currElecStatus

        public static java.lang.String currElecStatus()
        It tells you the electricity status based on time of the day. Modification is required for this method, because it can not identify holidays.
        Returns:
        Electricity status: OFF PEAK, MID PEAK or ON PEAK.

      • currElecPrice

        public static double currElecPrice()
        It tells you the electricity price based on time of the day.
        Returns:
        Current electricity price.
